title: What is the plural of Nasus?
body:
What is the plural of Nasus?

Nasuses? Nasi? Nasodes?

replies.body: was actually what i was going to say, down to the period. Then your comment loaded. Much sad.

My subconscious is telling me Nasi.

Because Nasus is probably derived from Nasal, and Nasai or Nasi is the plural of that I believe.

But it could well be similar to sheep, where 'sheep' is both the singular and the plural.

'Nasus' singular and 'Nasus' plural.
It's just like asking what's the plural for 'tuatara' when there's no s in the Maori alphabet/language so the plural for tuatara is just 'tuatara'.
